COMMANDS.LVLREWARDS_NOMA:
\❌ **%AUTHOR%**, Please specify the level and reward with the format `lvl-reward lvl-reward` Lvl must be a number and reward must be a role-id or role-mention. Example: 
`%PREFIX%%COMMAND% %TYPE% 1-762534019926354278 5-828384956392384562 20-637483920394857621 ...`
You can specify as many reward as you can
